version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

name.description: The name given to this test suite

lab_name.description: The name of the lab executing this test suite

time.description: The number of seconds it took to execute the entire test suite

job.description: The name of the job (aka the git tree)

kernel.description: The name of the kernel or the git describe value

defconfig_full.description: The full name of the defconfig, can also contain config fragments information

arch.description: The architecture type of this board

board_instance.description: The instance identifier of the board

job_id.description: The ID of the job that this test suite is being run on

build_id.description: The ID of the build that this test suite is being run on

boot_id.description: The ID of the boot test that this test suite is being run on

metadata.description: Free form object where to store accessory test suite data

test_case.description: The list of test case objects executed by this test suite

definition_uri.description: The URI where this test suite definition is stored

vcs_commit.description: The VCS commit value if the $definitio_uri field is a VCS URI
